headline: Allstate (ALL) Surpasses Q1 Earnings Estimates
summary: Allstate (ALL) delivered earnings and revenue surprises of 56.19% and 1.91%, respectively, for the quarter ended March 2025. Do the numbers hold clues to what lies ahead for the stock?

raw.headline: Allstate (ALL) Surpasses Q1 Earnings Estimates
raw.summary: Allstate (ALL) delivered earnings and revenue surprises of 56.19% and 1.91%, respectively, for the quarter ended March 2025. Do the numbers hold clues to what lies ahead for the stock?

headline: Allstate's first-quarter profit falls as catastrophe losses triple
summary: The results mirror those of peers W R Berkley and Chubb, which also reported a drop in first-quarter profit last week as industry-wide catastrophe losses offset operational gains.  California suffered from devastating wildfires in January that scorched entire Los Angeles neighborhoods.  Estimated to be the costliest wildfires in U.S. history for the insurance industry, the disaster claimed several lives and caused an estimated economic damage of as much as $250 billion.

headline: Allstate: Q1 Earnings Snapshot
summary: ALL) on Wednesday reported first-quarter profit of $595 million. On a per-share basis, the Northbrook, Illinois-based company said it had profit of $2.11. Earnings, adjusted for one-time gains and costs, came to $3.53 per share.

headline: Allstate Reports First Quarter 2025 Results
summary: NORTHBROOK, Ill., April 30, 2025--The Allstate Corporation (NYSE: ALL) today reported financial results for the first quarter of 2025.
